title: Found the pefect typeface, but it's not for sale!
content:
i found **Sputnic Breitfett** on the [Erwin Bauer site](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204120323/http:/www.erwinbauer.com/). i tried getting in touch with them, but it doesn’t look like it’s for sale. Can anyone help me with tips on typefaces with the same heavy and quirky feel?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204120323im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/sputnic_4404.jpg)

 [‹ July 31 "Ditch The Default Day"](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204120323/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46741 "Go to previous forum topic") [lookin for an icon library / collection ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204120323/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46855 "Go to next forum topic")
author: alexfjelldal
